title: Coronation Street fans spot unhidden Sophie pregnancy gaffe as exit storyline explained

Coronation Street fans spotted an unhidden Sophie Webster pregnancy gaffe tonight - and we came closer to finding out her exit storyline.

Brooke Vincent, who announced her pregnancy in April, is currently on maternity leave as she prepares to welcome her first child with her footballer boyfriend Kean Bryan, who plays for Sheffield United.

The popular actress, 27, managed to hide her baby bump with cunning camera tricks - but that hasn't stop some fans from noticing.

Sophie was visibly fed up with studying her business management course and aunt Debbie prompted her to reconsider her future.

The pair had a heart-to-heart in the pub, where Debbie told her niece that "life is for living" and that she should not end up like dad Kevin.

(Image: itv)

(Image: itv)

Corrie viewers took to Twitter after spotting Brooke's baby bump again in scenes tonight.

One fan said: "Sophie Webster has reached the Stacey Slater stage of pregnancy where they can’t even attempt to hide it"

"They must all be blind on the street... No one can see Sophie's up the duff," added another.

A third agreed: "Love how Corrie aren’t even trying to hide these baby bumps anymore"

"Not sure if Corrie can get away with Sophie’s pregnancy for much longer," said a fourth.

(Image: itv)

(Image: itv)

Debbie's advice prompted Sophie to reconsider her career options - and she convinced her dad to take the inheritance money.

Kevin was initially stubborn but agreed to take the money to split equally between himself, Jack, Rosie and Sophie.

Will Sophie use her share of the money to leave Wetherfield?

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

This is not the first time this week that viewers have noticed Brooke's baby bump on-screen.

Some Corrie fans managed to spot her bump while she was chatting to Alya Nazir about leaving her job to go and study.

Brooke received an emotional send-off from her Corrie co-stars last month after shooting her final scenes before going off on maternity leave.

(Image: ITV)

The actress did reveal the creative ways that soap bosses used during filming to conceal Beokke's blossoming baby bump.

They used piles of ironing and lots of big shopping bags in Brooke's scenes to keep viewers in the dark.

When the ironing prop was pointed out to her by the Conversation Street Podcast, Brooke said: "I think I was hidden behind one of Dev's shopping isles in the end."

*Coronation Street airs Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays on ITV at 7.30pm and 8.30pm
description: Coronation Street viewers noticed Brooke Vincent's beautiful baby bump as her character looks set to leave Weatherfield
